name: @filecataloger/native-modules
description: Native modules for FileCataloger - centralized build and dependency management

scripts.build: echo 'Using direct node-gyp build - advanced build system available in scripts/native/' && cd mouse-tracker/darwin && node-gyp rebuild && cd ../../drag-monitor && node-gyp rebuild
scripts.build:clean: cd mouse-tracker/darwin && node-gyp clean && node-gyp rebuild && cd ../../drag-monitor && node-gyp clean && node-gyp rebuild
scripts.build:verbose: cd mouse-tracker/darwin && node-gyp rebuild --verbose && cd ../../drag-monitor && node-gyp rebuild --verbose
scripts.test: echo 'Native module tests not yet implemented'
